results.title: Simvastatin in Critically Ill Patients with Covid-19
results.text_hl: We investigated the effect of the initiation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment on survival and organ support in hospitalized @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@Covid-19@@@ not receiving statins at baseline in the Randomized, Embedded, Multifactorial Adaptive Platform Trial for @DISEASE_Communication_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003147 @@@Community-Acquired Pneumonia@@@ (REMAP-@<m>DISEASE_115650</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:115650 @@@CAP@@@).

citations.NLM: REMAP-CAP Investigators, Hills TE, Lorenzi E, Berry LR, Shyamsundar M, Al-Beidh F, Annane D, Arabi Y, Aryal D, Au C, Beane A, Bhimani Z, Bonten M, Bradbury CA, Brunkhorst FM, Burrell A, Buxton M, Calfee CS, Cecconi M, Cheng AC, Cove ME, Detry MA, Estcourt LJ, Fitzgerald M, Goligher EC, Goossens H, Green C, Haniffa R, Harrison DA, Hashmi M, Higgins AM, Huang DT, Ichihara N, Jayakumar D, Kruger PS, Lamontagne F, Lampro L, Lawler PR, Marshall JC, Mason AJ, McGlothlin A, McGuinness S, McQuilten ZK, McVerry BJ, Mouncey PR, Murthy S, Neal MD, Nichol AD, O'Kane CM, Parke RL, Parker JC, Rabindrarajan E, Reyes LF, Rowan KM, Saito H, Santos M, Saunders CT, Seymour CW, Shankar-Hari M, Sinha P, Thompson BT, Turgeon AF, Turner AM, van de Veerdonk FV, Weis S, Young IS, Zarychanski R, Lewis RJ, McArthur CJ, Angus DC, Berry SM, Derde LPG, Webb SA, Gordon AC, McAuley DF. Simvastatin in Critically Ill Patients with Covid-19 N Engl J Med. 2023 Oct 25;():. PMID: 37888913
